title: Oceania Servers have been disconnecting people all morning, people have been losing LP
body: People have been disconnecting from oceania servers all morning, losing LP etc.  Is riot aware of this?  Are there going to be refunds of LP? 2 games ago I had 4 people disconnect. Now the 5 man I was in on discord we all just disconnected at the same time? Is it going to be fixed?  Acknowledgement of the issue will be good for a start :P.
